mapper.select: select s.shop_id,s.shop_name,s.shop_desc,s.shop_img,s.priority,s.shop_address, s.phone,s.create_time,s.last_edit_time,s.enable_status,s.advice, sc.shop_category_id,sc.shop_category_name, a.area_id,a.area_name from tb_shop s left join tb_area a on s.area_id = a.area_id left join tb_shop_category sc on s.shop_category_id = sc.shop_category_id where shop_id = #{shopId}
